src:
Sover du lite, blir du tykk, syk og dum
02 Nov 2019, 07:46 by Harry Tiller
Testiklene kan skrumpe. Sjansen til å bli gravid blir mindre. Faren for alvorlige sykdommer øker. Men det finnes en enkel og gratis kur.
Høstmørket kryper inn. Øyelokkene blir tunge. Jeg er sliten i kroppen og i hodet noen timer etter lunsjen. Kroppen prøver å fortelle meg noe. Jeg henter meg nok en sur kopp kaffe fra automaten på jobb for å gi meg selv et kick. Doper hjernen med koffein for å holde meg i gang, komme gjennom dagen.
text:
If you sleep little, you become fat, sick and stupid
02 Nov 2019, 07:46 by Harry Tiller
The testicles may shrink. The chance of getting pregnant is less. The risk of serious illnesses is increasing. But there is a simple and free cure.
Autumn darkness creeps in. The eyelids become heavy. I'm tired in my body and in my head a few hours after lunch. The body is trying to tell me something. I get myself another sour cup of coffee from the vending machine at work to give myself a kick. Doping the brain with caffeine to keep me going, get through the day.
